name: Kotor
justification: UNESCO Bay town. Cruise ship overcrowding severe. Resident concerns growing. Carrying capacity reached. Consolidation stage.

name: Lake Bled
justification: Slovenia's most famous destination. Over 1M visitors annually. Overtourism concerns emerging. Visitor management systems in place. Consolidation stage.

name: Kigali
justification: Clean, modern capital. Conference tourism growing. International hotels present. Strong development. Development stage.

name: Reykjavik
justification: Severe overtourism pressures. Airbnb density displacing residents. Tourism-oriented businesses replacing local shops. Government implementing visitor management. Classic Consolidation/Stagnation characteristics.

name: Tbilisi
justification: Capital with booming tourism. International hotels arriving. Nightlife and food tourism. Strong growth trajectory. Development stage.

name: Maldives
justification: Welcomed 2.25M tourists in 2025, 9.8% increase. 183 luxury resorts with 45,289 beds. Tourism is primary economic driver. Mature market with global brand presence. Environmental carrying capacity concerns emerging.

name: Gozo
justification: Quieter sister island with growing tourism. Diving and rural tourism focus. Less developed than Malta. Development stage.

name: Kotor
justification: UNESCO Bay town. Cruise ship overcrowding severe. Resident concerns growing. Carrying capacity reached. Consolidation stage.

name: Tbilisi
justification: Capital with booming tourism. International hotels arriving. Nightlife and food tourism. Strong growth trajectory. Development stage.

name: Tirana
justification: Capital saw 26% visitor growth in Dec 2024. 45% of tourists visit. International hotel brands arriving. Cultural tourism growing. Strong Development stage.

name: Kigali
justification: Clean, modern capital. Conference tourism growing. International hotels present. Strong development. Development stage.

name: Reykjavik
justification: Severe overtourism pressures. Airbnb density displacing residents. Tourism-oriented businesses replacing local shops. Government implementing visitor management. Classic Consolidation/Stagnation characteristics.

name: Male
justification: Capital city handles 74% of arrivals through main airport. Fully developed tourism infrastructure. Major hotel chains present. Gateway hub reaching capacity limits. Clear Consolidation characteristics.

name: Reykjavik
justification: Severe overtourism pressures. Airbnb density displacing residents. Tourism-oriented businesses replacing local shops. Government implementing visitor management. Classic Consolidation/Stagnation characteristics.

name: Kigali
justification: Clean, modern capital. Conference tourism growing. International hotels present. Strong development. Development stage.

name: Maldives
justification: Welcomed 2.25M tourists in 2025, 9.8% increase. 183 luxury resorts with 45,289 beds. Tourism is primary economic driver. Mature market with global brand presence. Environmental carrying capacity concerns emerging.

name: Batumi
justification: Black Sea resort city. Major casino tourism. High-rise development. Beach tourism dominant. Development stage.

name: Kotor
justification: UNESCO Bay town. Cruise ship overcrowding severe. Resident concerns growing. Carrying capacity reached. Consolidation stage.

name: Kigali
justification: Clean, modern capital. Conference tourism growing. International hotels present. Strong development. Development stage.

name: Ljubljana
justification: Capital with strong tourism growth. Pedestrianized center. International hotel brands. Year-round destination. Development stage.

name: Tirana
justification: Capital saw 26% visitor growth in Dec 2024. 45% of tourists visit. International hotel brands arriving. Cultural tourism growing. Strong Development stage.

name: Belize
justification: Record 21% tourism growth in 2024 with 562,405 overnight visitors. $250M airport expansion underway. Tourism accounts for 46% of GDP. Strong external investment but infrastructure still developing. Transitioning from Involvement to mature Development.

name: Ambergris Caye
justification: Belize's most developed tourism destination with 70+ hotels, mostly foreign-owned. Tourism began in 1970s and now dominates the island. Facing infrastructure strain from success - water/sanitation issues affecting reef. Shows classic Consolidation characteristics.

name: Caye Caulker
justification: Experiencing rapid tourism growth while maintaining laid-back character. New developments increasing but still preserves authentic Caribbean feel. Infrastructure improving with new ferry services. Mid-Development stage with strong growth trajectory.

name: Hopkins
justification: Small Garifuna village transitioning to tourism economy. Community-based tourism model with local ownership. Basic facilities emerging, cultural authenticity preserved. Classic Involvement stage characteristics.

name: Placencia
justification: Major tourism development zone with new resorts and real estate investment. Featured in Belize Tourism Board development plans. Growing rapidly but still building infrastructure. Active Development stage.

name: San Ignacio
justification: Gateway to Mayan ruins and jungle adventures. Local operators dominate tourism services. Tourism season emerging with growing visitor numbers. Infrastructure basic but improving. Involvement stage.

name: Toledo District
justification: Remote southern region with minimal tourism infrastructure. Pristine rainforests and Mayan villages. Attracts adventurous ecotourists. Very limited facilities. True Exploration stage destination.

name: Maldives
justification: Welcomed 2.25M tourists in 2025, 9.8% increase. 183 luxury resorts with 45,289 beds. Tourism is primary economic driver. Mature market with global brand presence. Environmental carrying capacity concerns emerging.

name: Male
justification: Capital city handles 74% of arrivals through main airport. Fully developed tourism infrastructure. Major hotel chains present. Gateway hub reaching capacity limits. Clear Consolidation characteristics.

name: Maafushi
justification: Pioneer local island for guesthouse tourism since 2009 liberalization. Over 50 guesthouses now operating. Rapid development transforming fishing village. Strong Development stage growth.

name: Thulusdhoo
justification: Emerging surf tourism destination on local island. Small but growing guesthouse sector. Local entrepreneurs beginning tourism services. Early Involvement stage.

name: Fuvahmulah
justification: Remote southern atoll with unique geography. Emerging diving destination for tiger sharks. Very limited tourist facilities. Adventurous travelers only. Exploration stage.

name: Malta
justification: 1.2M tourists in peak year for tiny island nation. UNESCO sites and beach tourism. Major cruise destination. Tourism dominates economy at 27% of GDP. Mature market facing capacity limits.

name: Valletta
justification: UNESCO capital city. Dense tourism development. Cruise passengers overwhelm small streets. Historic sites at capacity. Consolidation stage.

name: Gozo
justification: Quieter sister island with growing tourism. Diving and rural tourism focus. Less developed than Malta. Development stage.

name: Mdina
justification: Ancient walled city limiting visitor numbers. Day-trip destination from Valletta. Preserved but tourist-focused. Consolidation characteristics.

name: Comino
justification: Small island famous for Blue Lagoon. Day trips only, no accommodation. Seasonal overcrowding issues emerging. Involvement stage.

name: Iceland
justification: 2.3M visitors in 2024 (6x the population). Tourism is 8.5% of GDP. Implementing overtourism measures including surge pricing and conservation fees. Sustainable tourism focus. Development with Consolidation pressures.

name: Reykjavik
justification: Severe overtourism pressures. Airbnb density displacing residents. Tourism-oriented businesses replacing local shops. Government implementing visitor management. Classic Consolidation/Stagnation characteristics.

name: Blue Lagoon
justification: Iceland's most visited attraction with strict visitor quotas. Pre-booking required. Premium pricing strategy. Environmental management intensive. Peak Consolidation.

name: Akureyri
justification: Northern capital growing as alternative to Reykjavik. Cruise ship calls increasing. Tourism infrastructure expanding. Year-round destination strategy. Development stage.

name: Westfjords
justification: Remote peninsula with minimal infrastructure. Attracts adventurous travelers seeking isolation. Very limited services. Long travel times. Exploration stage.

name: Eastfjords
justification: Least visited region of Iceland. Sparse population and facilities. Emerging hiking and nature tourism. Very early stage development. Exploration characteristics.

name: Albania
justification: 11.7M visitors in 2024, 80% increase vs 2019. One of world's fastest-growing destinations. €2.3B tourism revenue. New Llogara Tunnel improving access. Rapid Development but infrastructure still catching up.

name: Tirana
justification: Capital saw 26% visitor growth in Dec 2024. 45% of tourists visit. International hotel brands arriving. Cultural tourism growing. Strong Development stage.

name: Sarande
justification: Major Riviera destination facing overcrowding. Year-round tourism now. Infrastructure strained by growth. Transitioning toward Consolidation with carrying capacity concerns.

name: Ksamil
justification: Beach destination near Greek border. Rapid recent development. Local infrastructure struggling to keep pace. Popular with regional tourists. Late Involvement/early Development.

name: Berat
justification: UNESCO World Heritage Ottoman town. Heritage tourism growing steadily. Local guides and guesthouses emerging. Authentic character preserved. Involvement stage.

name: Gjirokaster
justification: UNESCO stone city with growing cultural tourism. World Bank heritage tourism investment. Local community engagement increasing. Involvement stage characteristics.

name: Theth
justification: Remote Albanian Alps village. Attracts hikers on Peaks of Balkans trail. Very basic facilities, no paved road access. Adventure travelers only. Exploration stage.

name: Slovenia
justification: 4M+ visitors annually. Sustainable tourism leader. Ljubljana European Green Capital. Well-developed infrastructure. Strong Development stage.

name: Ljubljana
justification: Capital with strong tourism growth. Pedestrianized center. International hotel brands. Year-round destination. Development stage.

name: Lake Bled
justification: Slovenia's most famous destination. Over 1M visitors annually. Overtourism concerns emerging. Visitor management systems in place. Consolidation stage.

name: Piran
justification: Venetian coastal town. Growing tourism pressure. Cruise day-trippers increasing. Infrastructure adequate. Development stage.

name: Bovec
justification: Adventure tourism hub in Julian Alps. Small but growing sector. Local operators dominant. Involvement stage.

name: Skocjan Caves
justification: UNESCO World Heritage site. Guided tours only with capacity limits. Growing visitor numbers. Involvement/Development transition.

name: Georgia
justification: 7.7M visitors in 2024. Fast-growing destination. Wine tourism and cultural heritage focus. Infrastructure developing rapidly. Development stage.

name: Tbilisi
justification: Capital with booming tourism. International hotels arriving. Nightlife and food tourism. Strong growth trajectory. Development stage.

name: Batumi
justification: Black Sea resort city. Major casino tourism. High-rise development. Beach tourism dominant. Development stage.

name: Kazbegi
justification: Mountain destination growing rapidly. Basic infrastructure improving. Adventure tourism focus. Involvement stage.

name: Svaneti
justification: Remote mountain region. UNESCO towers. Very basic facilities. Adventurous travelers. Exploration stage.

name: Kakheti
justification: Wine region developing agrotourism. Small guesthouses and wineries. Local entrepreneurship. Involvement stage.

name: Montenegro
justification: 2.5M visitors annually for small nation. Coastal tourism dominant. Real estate development pressure. Development/Consolidation mix.

name: Kotor
justification: UNESCO Bay town. Cruise ship overcrowding severe. Resident concerns growing. Carrying capacity reached. Consolidation stage.

name: Budva
justification: Major beach resort. Dense hotel development. Package tourism dominant. Mature market. Consolidation stage.

name: Durmitor
justification: Mountain national park. Hiking and rafting tourism. Basic facilities. Growing slowly. Involvement stage.

name: Ulcinj
justification: Southern beach town. Less developed than north. Albanian influence. Growing interest. Involvement stage.

name: Perast
justification: Tiny Bay of Kotor village. Day-trip destination. Very limited capacity. Charming but fragile. Development stage.

name: Rwanda
justification: Tourism 2nd largest forex earner. Gorilla permits $1,500. High-value, low-volume model. Sustainable development focus. Development stage.

name: Kigali
justification: Clean, modern capital. Conference tourism growing. International hotels present. Strong development. Development stage.

name: Volcanoes National Park
justification: Famous gorilla trekking. Limited permits protect habitat. High-end lodges. Sustainable model. Development stage.

name: Nyungwe Forest
justification: Emerging chimp trekking destination. Basic facilities improving. Conservation focus. Involvement stage.

name: Lake Kivu
justification: Scenic lake with growing tourism. Local guesthouses emerging. Water activities developing. Involvement stage.
